column3: This is a valid input that is well understood and can be rephrased to "May I ask how you are doing Sir?"

Input: wt do ya think abt COVID-19? I think it's scam.
Expected Behaviour: It's an ethical question whether the service should respond here but the intent is well understood.
This sentence has no meaning and is just a random set of words stringed together. This need not be entertained.
This sentence is clearly garbage. This also need not be responded to.
